00109 
00110 void Schema_Adams_Bashforth_order_2::compute_adams_bashforth_coefficients(double time_step, const DoubleTab& times)
00111 {
00112   assert(times.size_array() == 3); //past, present and future times, stored in ascending order inside "times" table
00113 
00114   if (coefficients().size_array() != 2)
00115     {
00116       coefficients().resize(2,Array_base::NOCOPY_NOINIT);
00117     }
00118 
00119   double past_time          = times[0];
00120   double present_time       = times[1];
00121   double future_time        = times[2];
00122   double past_time_step     = present_time-past_time;
00123 
00124   coefficients()[1] = 1./past_time_step;
00125   coefficients()[1] *= (future_time+present_time-2*past_time);
00126   coefficients()[1] *= 0.5;
00127   assert(coefficients()[1] >= 0.);
00128 
00129   coefficients()[0] = 1-coefficients()[1];
00130   assert(coefficients()[0] <= 1.);
00131 }
